text: aur sab milakar allaah kee rassee ko mazabootee se pakad lo aur vibhed mein na pado. aur allaah kee us krpa ko yaad karo jo tumapar huee. jab tum aapas mein ek-doosare ke shatru the to usane tumhaare dilon ko paraspar jod diya aur tum usakee krpa se bhaee-bhaee ban gae. tum aag ke ek gaddhe ke kinaare khade the, to allaah ne usase tumhen bacha liya. is prakaar allaah tumhaare lie apanee aayate khol-kholakar bayaan karata hai, taaki tum maarg pa lo
